adept.common

Class ScriptEventArgument

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.ScriptEventArgument

  • public final class ScriptEventArgument
extends Object
    Represents an event argument in a Script. All script-related classes are "locally immutable" so long as the IType implementation used is. However, they all inherit from the mutable HltContent class, whose associated fields are mutable. The Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) implementations are the default.
